# ciscosecureaccess_application_list (Resource)

Manages an application list in Cisco Secure Access



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `application_ids` (List of Number) The list of IDs for the applications
- `application_list_name` (String) The descriptive label for the application list
- `is_default` (Boolean) Specifies whether the application list is the default application list

### Optional

- `application_category_ids` (List of Number) The list of IDs for the application categories

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) The date and time that the application list was created
- `id` (Number) Unique identifier for application list
- `modified_at` (String) The date and time that the application list was modified
